tasks.test: deno task macro-test && deno task js-interop-test && deno task operator-test && deno task import-test && deno task data-structures-test && deno task hql-spec-test
tasks.macro-test: deno task test-do && deno task test-and && deno task test-or && deno task test-not && deno task test-defn && deno task test-cond && deno task test-export && deno task quote-quasiquote-tests && deno task test-daily-macro && deno task test-let && deno task test-core-primitives
tasks.quote-quasiquote-tests: deno task test-quote && deno task test-quasiquote
tasks.js-interop-test: deno test --allow-all test/macro/js_interop_test.ts && deno test --allow-all test/interop/dot_accessor_test.ts && deno test --allow-all test/interop/chained_calls_test.ts
tasks.data-structures-test: deno task test-empty-literals && deno task test-normal-literals
